org.jclouds.cloudstack.features
Interface ISOApi

All Superinterfaces:
ISOClient
public interface ISOApi
extends ISOClient

Provides synchronous access to CloudStack Account features.

Note that this class is transitionary and will fully replace ISOClient in 1.7.

Author:
Adrian Cole
See Also:
